metadata.description:
128 pages!
Ariel Chylde is the girl cursed to become any of the creatures from her many Nightmares. But have the shadows circled all her life? Now we go deeper. Into her past. Into her dreams. Where fears roam, and truth is never a friend. New Collection and Cover by RANDY QUEEN. Collects DREAMS OF DARKCHYLDE #1-6
metadata.name: Dreams of Darkchylde
